sentence.Network_en: It was Aristotle who proved the world is round. Plato popularized the concept.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚里士多德证明了地球是圆的，柏拉图普及了这一概念。

sentence.Network_en: He had rather be damned with Plato than saved with those who anathematized him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他宁可让自己的灵魂与柏拉图一道被罚入地狱,也不愿和谴责他的人们一起升入天国.

sentence.Network_en: It is doubtful if Plato would have regarded this as possible.
sentence.Network_cn: 柏拉图是否认为这是可能的尚值得怀疑.
